summary: THE REAR HEATER HOSE/PIPE BENEATH DRIVER'S DOOR RUPTURED RELEASING STEAM AND HOT ENGINE COOLANT (CHRYSLER PART# 3849951).  THIS METAL PIPE IS MADE OF CHEAP HIGHLY CORROSION SUSCEPTIBLE METAL THAT RUSTS OUT IN A FEW YEARS.  THIS IS SECOND REPLACEMENT DUE TO PIPE RUPTURE (FIRST WAS MARCH 1998).   *NLM
